page.title: 09GOVERNMENT WEST FLEGG
page.content: The Parish Council's functions are mowing grass, opinions on new houses and they look after the interests of the village. The Borough Council in Yarmouth has 48 members one from each village and their functions are council houses, dustmen, planning aplications, toilets, parks, blue buses, Marina Centre and the Race course. On the County Council there are about 90 members,the member for West Flegg is Richard Tingey who is also a Governor of our school. Their functions are schools, roads, police, fire brigade, social services (old people, children in need etc...) and libraries. In central government there are over 600 members of Parliament our MP is Michael Carttiss who was Chairman of our school for several years.
